column3: Can you explain why this is needed?
@MarcoFalke before #11634 the lock wasn't held when calling `uiInterface.LoadWallet(walletInstance)`. My suggestion was to revert that ~~behaviour~~ change.
Yeah, I don't see the change in behaviour. Is there any?
Ah ok. Slightly tend to NACK due to our refactoring guidelines.
I don't get it why this is refactoring, this should just revert something that was changed for no good reason. Anyway it was just a comment.
